articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Taedonggang Eel Breeding Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Taedonggang Eel Breeding Farm
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Taedonggang Eel Breeding Farm of KPA Unit 522.
					 After being briefed on the farm before a huge map showing its panoramic view, he looked round various places of the farm including a combined control room, an analysis and experiment room and indoor fish ponds to learn in detail about its technical equipment and eel breeding and management.
					
					 The farm has put all its production processes on a high level of scientific and modern basis, thus getting the examination of water temperature and its quality and all other processes computerized, he said, adding that the farm is capable of substantially benefiting people as it is fitted with cutting-edge equipment and was built on the principle of profitability. 
					
					 Noting that the KPA steering the era of Songun is playing a pace-setter's role in carrying out the Party's policy of fish breeding, too, he said with pride that it is none other than the servicepersons of the KPA who are pace-setters in breeding rare fishes including sturgeon and eel in a cutting-edge manner.
					
					 He advanced the important tasks to be carried out by the farm. 
					
					 He said that the farm can turn into a leading eel production center in a short span of time if it designs its work under a long-term plan and minutely organizes it as the farm has laid a solid scientific and technological foundation and accumulated a wealth of experience.   
					
					 What is most important for boosting the production of eel is to establish a scientific system for breeding and management, he noted, adding that to this end it is necessary to intensify the researches and steadily raise the level of technical skills of technicians and breeders. 
					
					 He underscored the need to put fish breeding on a scientific and intensive basis by steadily deepening the researches into fishes of other species now making successful progress on the farm in order to dynamically push forward the work for massively breeding not only eel but rare fishes by an industrial method. 
					
					 He earnestly called on the farm to steadily boost the productivity at the existing fish breeding centers and build more modern fish farms to rapidly increase the production of freshwater fishes so that the people in the era of the Workers' Party may be provided with greater quantities of high quality fishes including tasty and nutritious eel.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the officials, workers and technicians of the farm would devote themselves to the building of a rich and powerful country and thus creditably perform their honorable mission and duty as true servants for the people. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Choe Ryong Hae and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Swiss President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Swiss President
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Micheline Calmy-Rey upon his election as president of the Swiss Confederation. 
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in line with the common interests, the message wished the president good health and happiness and bigger success in his work.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Bahrain
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Bahrain
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Sheikh Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, king of Bahrain, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished him steady success in his work for the social stability and economic development of the country and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Bahrain would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Dutch Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Dutch Ambassador
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Dutch Ambassador to the DPRK Paul Alex Menkveld at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in Cuban Revolution Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in Cuban Revolution Observed
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Wednesday on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution. 
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee, and others.
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy here were present there.
					
					 Jose Manuel Galego Montano said in his speech made at the reception that since the victory of the revolution the Cuban people have made great successes in various fields while frustrating the imperialists' moves for aggression and economic blockade. Cuba will build socialism with optimism about future to suit its actual conditions, he noted, and continued: 
					
					 Cuba is proud of having particular friendly relations with the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Jong Il and the Korean people.
					
					 Recalling that the two countries significantly observed the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties, he declared the Cuban people would as ever stand by the Korean people in their efforts to accomplish the just cause.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in his speech that the Cuban people have made great progress in accomplishing the socialist cause while firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 He noted that the WPK and the government of the DPRK are rejoiced as over their own over the successes made by the Cuban people in socialist construction.
					
					 The Korean people will as always join the Cuban comrades in the positive efforts to steadily expand and develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries based on the revolutionary obligation, he concluded.

articles.title: Book "Korean Animals" Published
articles.content:
Book "Korean Animals" Published
						
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Scientific and Technological Publishing House of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently brought out the first volume of the bird part of the book "Korean Animals".
					 The first volume deals with distribution, morphology, ecology and economic value of birds of 456 kinds belonging to the country's bird resources, classified according to order, family, kind and species.
					
					 It is conducive to studying and exploring the bird resources of the country and protecting and multiplying them.

articles.title: Reconstructed State Theatre
articles.content:
Reconstructed State Theatre
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The State Theatre in Pyongyang was reconstructed in a fashionable way to suit both classical and modern aesthetic tastes.
					 The 620-seat theatre has up-to-date lighting and sound arresting facilities with its interior decorated in a peculiar and beautiful way. 
					
					 The broad stage has several draw curtains to serve the convenience of drama performance.
					
					 The main hall of the theatre has gorgeous chandeliers and light decorations, with beautiful curves of the stairs and ceiling adding to its fascinating appearance.
					
					 The front wall of the hall is embossed with impressive scenes of "The Shrine", "Blood at an International Conference", "Three Pretenders" and other two revolutionary dramas, elevating the features of the theatre as the centre of Juche-oriented theatrical art.
					
					 The theatre is furnished with rehearsal halls, dressing rooms, auxiliary buildings, welfare service amenities and all other facilities needed to conduct artistic activities and appreciate performance.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il initiated the reconstruction of the theatre and dispatched able designers and a strong building force to undertake the project. He frequently acquainted himself with the progress of the reconstruction and solved all problems arising in the project.
					
					 Under his wise leadership, the project was completed successfully in a matter of four months or little more.

articles.title: Historic Meeting Marking Start of Anti-Japanese Struggle
articles.content:
Historic Meeting Marking Start of Anti-Japanese Struggle
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- December 16 is the 79th anniversary of the Winter Mingyuegou Meeting convened by President Kim Il Sung.
					He, in his reminiscences "With the Century", described the meeting of Juche 20 (1931) as the start of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and a historic meeting that brought about a fresh turn in the anti-Japanese national liberation movement and communist movement in Korea. 
					
					After launching an invasion of Manchuria in the beginning of the 1930s with the Manchurian incident as an occasion, the Japanese imperialists intensified the suppression of the Korean people.
					
					The Korean people's anti-Japanese struggle upsurged rapidly and eventually led to violence.
					
					The President, basing himself on a scientific analysis of the prevailing situation, convened a meeting of party and young communist league cadres in Mingyuegou, Yanji County.
					
					At the meeting he advanced a policy of launching an armed struggle based on guerrilla warfare.
					
					He explained the difference between a regular army and a guerrilla army and said that in order to defeat the Japanese aggression forces, it was necessary to conduct such military, political and economic activities as adroit combined operations of small and large units, surprise attack, ambush, political work, political underground activities and production. He also said a guerrilla army capable of undertaking a war through repeated dispersal and gathering at will should be formed to this end. 
					
					His idea on the guerrilla warfare was a just one for dealing a heavy political and military blow to the enemy, with the guerrilla forces preserved, and defeating the enemy, superior in number and arms, with less forces.
					
					The meeting discussed tasks and ways for the guerrilla warfare.
					
					In 1932 a revolutionary armed unit was founded to put the Korean revolution on a higher level.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Puppet Minister of Unification's Outbursts
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Puppet Minister of Unification's Outbursts
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, puppet minister of Unification, is more glaringly revealing his true colors as an anti-reunification confrontation element as the days go by. 
					 Hyon in his appearance at a recent "academic meeting" blustered that it is necessary for "south Korea to carve out the future of the Korean Peninsula on its initiative" with "freedom, human rights, democracy and market economy as values," terming the Yonphyong Island shelling incident "the last option" of someone. 
					
					 These reckless confrontation remarks only betray the group of traitors' sinister attempt to further escalate the confrontation between the north and the south and hype their scenario for achieving unification through absorption. 
					
					 Hyon is wholly to blame for escalating the confrontation between compatriots hour by hour, holding the post of the chief of the ministry as he was an architect of the policy of anti-reunification and confrontation of the south Korean conservative regime and its executor.
					
					He put up the watchword "no nukes, opening and 3000 dollars" little short of a declaration of confrontation with the DPRK in total denial of the June 15 joint declaration. He derailed dialogue, cooperation and exchange between the north and the south and deepened distrust and confrontation, crying out for "setting right the inter-Korean relations" that allegedly went wrong in the last decade. This was all what he has done.
					
					 No wonder, the puppet ministry of Unification is derided by the south Korean people as a ministry of division and confrontation as it has taken the lead in bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse. 
					
					  The boss of the ministry has gone the lengths of crying out for unification through absorption, not content with inciting confrontation. This indicates the group of traitors is in its evil days. 
					
					 The conservative group of south Korea is strongly censured by the public at home and abroad for having pushed the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe. It is tight-cornered internally and externally. 
					
					 In order to seek a way out of this predicament the group talked nonsense shortly ago that what is the most important at the present stage is to build up public opinion calling for the discussion on "expenses for unification" and "proposal for the delivery of economic resources" and it is necessary to bring about "a social agreement." The group also let loose sophism calling for unification through absorption at an "academic meeting" in the wake of trumpeting about "ten-year plan for unification."
					
					  These facts go to prove that the ulterior intention of the puppet group's rackets for confrontation with the DPRK and a war is to escalate the confrontation of the systems and realize its wild ambition to achieve unification through absorption. 
					
					 The confrontation elements utterly ignorant of the socialist system in the DPRK centered on the popular masses are free to let loose reckless remarks slandering it, seized with the wild ambition to achieve unification through absorption.  This is as foolish an act as beating the air. 
					
					 It is impossible to achieve national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, as long as such diehard anti-reunification element as Hyon is allowed to stay in office.

articles.title: S. Korean Minister of Unification's Reckless Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Minister of Unification's Reckless Remarks Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet minister of Unification Hyon In Thaek in his appearance at a recent "academic meeting" let loose a spate of outbursts seriously getting on the nerves of the DPRK, talking about "the last option" and the like as regards the Yonphyong Island shelling incident. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to prove his sinister intention to pass the buck for the Yonphyong Island shelling incident on to the DPRK and steadily push forward the policy to escalate the moves for confrontation and war, while further aggravating the inter-Korean relations under the pretext of it.
					
					 Clarifying the background against which the incident took place, the commentary observes that it was the south Korean puppet forces that made the last option.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The south Korean ultra-right conservative forces put up the watchword "no nukes, opening and 3000 dollars" as their "policy toward the north" after their seizure of power in total denial of the inter-Korean joint declarations and have since rushed headlong into increased dependence on foreign forces and escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Yonphyong Island shelling incident was orchestrated as part of those moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen. This incident goes to clearly prove in practice what is the policy of escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen pursued by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 It is the unanimous view of the publics at home and abroad that the south Korean authorities are the most disgraceful loser in this incident.
					
					 The moves are backfiring quite contrary to their intention.
					
					 No wonder, views were openly expressed even by minions of the south Korean ruling forces that officials in charge of diplomacy and security including Hyon In Thaek should be replaced. 
					
					 Much upset by this development, he cried out for "carving out future on the Korean Peninsula with the initiative on the part of south Korea" with "freedom, democracy and market economy" as "values" and "establishing sound inter-Korean relations on the basis of stable security with the firm will to build 'a new house,'" not content with vociferating about "the last option".
					
					 Hyon thus made the last option disclosing his sinister intention to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen to the last.
					
					 It is not hard to guess what Hyon would get from the last option.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japanese PM's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japanese PM's Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan cried out for "dispatching" the "Self-Defense Forces" in contingency on the Korean Peninsula under the signboard of "protection of Japanese" and working out "regulations" for putting it into practice. 
					 This brings to bolder relief the present Japanese authorities' scenario for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 Kan's reckless remarks about "the protection of Japanese" are the replica of the pretext of the "protection of Japanese residents" which the Japanese imperialists always used before igniting wars of aggression in the last centuries. 
					
					When the Kapo Peasant War broke out in 1894 in Korea the Japanese imperialists hurled 10,000 strong ground and naval forces into Korea under the pretext of "protecting" Japanese residents in a bid to ignite the 1894-1895 Sino-Japanese War.
					
					 Early in the 20th century, they hurled huge aggressor troops into Korea under the same pretence before putting Korea under military occupation and establishing a colonial rule over it. 
					
					 They used the pretext of "protecting Japanese residents" and "purging" anti-Japanese forces when they perpetrated monstrous massacres in the history including the great "punitive operation" in Jiandao and the "punitive operation" in east Manchuria. 
					
					 It was due to the policy of "protecting Japanese residents" enforced by the Japanese imperialists that Korea was eclipsed on the world map and at least 8.4 million Koreans were taken away to alien countries to do slave labor and more than one million Koreans were killed. 
					
					 Historical facts prove that the "protection of Japanese residents" touted by Japan is the pronoun and prelude to aggression, war and plunder. 
					
					 Japan's intention to hurl SDF into Korea in contingency on the Korean Peninsula under the pretence of "protecting Japanese residents" is to stage a comeback to Korea and realize its old dream of "the Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" which it failed to do in the last century, taking advantage of it. 
					
					 Japan has already deployed main forces of SDF in its western region close to the Korean Peninsula and rounded off war legislations including "the law on the situation in the surrounding areas" and "the law on the emergency situation." In summer this year Japan let officers of the Maritime SDF get aboard nuclear carrier George Washington involved in the U.S.-south Korea joint naval exercises held in the East Sea of Korea, kicking up war hysteria. 
					
					 In reality, Japan has emerged a war state having all legal, human and material preparations necessary for fighting a war of aggression. 
					
					 What remains to be done is for Japan to secure a pretext for launching reinvasion. To this end, Kan repeated such rhetoric as "protection of Japanese" which the Japanese imperialists used for starting wars in the last century. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the present Japanese authorities are craftily working to justify their policy for invading Korea at a time when the situation on the Korean Peninsula reached the brink of war due to the military clash on Yonphyong Island. 
					
					 It is the trite and sinister method of Japan to add fuel to the fire and craftily make it serve its purpose in a bid to fish in troubled waters.
					
					 Japan did so whenever the situation got tense on the peninsula, to say nothing of the time when the Korean War was fought. 
					
					  When the warship "Cheonan" sinking case broke out in south Korea Japan used it for quelling the discontent and anger of the Japanese people over the issue of the U.S. military base in Futenma to please its American master and get a great benefit. This helped reinforce its military foundation for staging a comeback to Korea. 
					
					 Japan is now so emboldened that it is set to launch a war of aggression by openly hurling its forces into the peninsula, taking advantage of the military clash on Yonphyong Island. 
					
					 The Japanese militarists can never realize their wild ambition for reinvading Korea as all the Koreans are highly vigilant against it. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon Japan watching for a chance of reinvasion, far from making apology and reparation for its crimes committed against the Korean people in the past.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails at Japanese Warmongers' War Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails at Japanese Warmongers' War Hysteria 
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Japan together with the U.S. staged the largest-ever joint military exercises from Dec. 3 to 10. South Korea also participated in the military exercises as "observer" in a token of "alliance" and "solidarity". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 No sooner had the U.S.-south Korea joint maneuvers been over than the Japanese warmongers staged the largest-ever joint military exercises with the U.S. This brings into bolder relief the aggressive nature of the Japanese militarist forces blinded with the wild ambition for reinvasion. 
					
					 It is a hackneyed method of Japan to go reckless in a bid to fish in troubled waters, seizing the situation getting tense on the Korean Peninsula every time as a "good chance". 
					
					 It was in pursuance of this aim that the Japanese reactionaries staged the madcap military exercises, keeping pace with the moves of the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces to ignite a war. This is little short of adding fuel to the fire. 
					
					 The U.S. is staging joint military exercises one after another in the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula in a bid to aggravate the situation in Northeast Asia. Through them the U.S. seeks to knock into shape a triangular military alliance grouping the U.S., Japan and south Korea and secure a pretext for starting a war in the region. Meanwhile, the Japanese reactionaries, sitting on a war chariot of the U.S., seek to turn Japan into a military giant and realize their ambition for reinvasion. 
					
					 The Japanese militarists are now kicking up war hysteria, seriously threatening and disturbing the peace and security in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 But, Japan's option for reinvasion only leads to destruction and disgrace. The time will prove it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Criadero de Anguilas Taedonggang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Criadero de Anguilas Taedonggang
						
 Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Criadero de Anguilas Taedonggang subordinado a la Unidad 525 del EPC.
					  Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano, se entero detalladamente del estado de equipos tecnicos y cria recorriendo la sala de control general, la de analisis y experimento, las lagunas de cria bajo techo y otros lugares.
					
					  Gracias a la fundamentacion cientifica y la modernizacion en el alto nivel, se controlan con las computadoras todos los procesos productivos de esta fabrica, como el ajuste de la temperatura de agua y el analisis de calidad acuifera, senalo y subrayo que esta fabrica, dotada de equipos sofisticados y construida rentablemente, puede beneficiar realmente al pueblo.
					
					  Indico que nuestro ejercito, que encauza la epoca del Songun, cumple el papel de vanguardia tambien en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido sobre la piscicultura.
					
					 Prosiguio en tono orgulloso que son los militares del EPC los precursores de la piscicultura del nivel sofisticado como la cria de esturiones y anguilas.
					
					  Presento las tareas programaticas que debe cumplir la fabrica en lo adelante.
					
					  Puesto que esta fabrica ha sentado solida base cientifico-tecnica y acumulado ricas experiencias, es posible convertirla en un corto plazo en una renombrada base de produccion de anguilas si se planean con vistas al futuro y se organizan bien los trabajos, enseno.
					
					Establecer el cientifico sistema de cria constituye la tarea mas importante para aumentar la produccion de anguilas y para este fin, se debe intensificar la investigacion y elevar constantemente el nivel tecnico y la calificacion de tecnicos y criadores, apunto.
					
					Ademas, hay que seguir profundizando los estudios de otras especies de pez, que se impulsan exitosamente ahora en esta fabrica, para criarlas de modo cientifico y en masas en areas reducidas, dijo y destaco la necesidad de continuar las labores para criar en mayor cantidad y de modo industrial los peces raros como anguila.
					
					Encomendo encarecidamente que en la epoca del Partido del Trabajo, suministren a nuestro pueblo mucho mas pescados de buena calidad como la sabrosa y nutrimental anguila, al aumentar constantemente la produccion de pescados de aguas dulces elevando sin parar la productividad de las bases piscicolas ya preparadas y construyendo mas criaderos modernos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica cumpliran excelentemente su honrosa mision y deber como servidores verdaderos al pueblo trabajando abnegadamente para construir una patria prospera.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico y jefa de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Choe Ryong Hae y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: MINREX informa resultado del dialogo entre cancilleres Corea-Rusia
articles.content:
MINREX informa resultado del dialogo entre cancilleres Corea-Rusia
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con respecto a las conversaciones entre los cancilleres de Corea y Rusia sostenidas en Moscu, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 14 la siguiente respuesta a la ATCC:
					El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun, quien esta de visita en Rusia cumplimentando la invitacion de su homologo ruso Lavrov, converso con este el dia 13 en Moscu y firmo el plan de intercambio 2011-2012 entre las cancillerias de los dos paises. 
					
					En la ocasion ambas partes evaluaron que este ano, los dos paises conmemoraron significativamente en conjunto el 10o aniversario de la Declaracion Conjunta Corea-Rusia y del Tratado Interestatal Corea-Rusia y llegaron al consenso en los problemas debatidos profundamente para desarrollar y ampliar mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises. 
					
					Ademas, intercambiaron las opiniones sinceras sobre los problemas regionales e internacionales de interes mutuo. 
					
					La parte rusa expreso suficiente entendimiento a la posicion de la parte coreana sobre la grave situacion creada actualmente en la Peninsula Coreana y su seria preocupacion por la exacerbacion continua de la situacion de esa area debido al incidente de la isla Yonphyong, desatado por la provocacion del Sur de Corea, y a los sucesivos ejercicios militares de gran envergadura que libra ese ultimo junto con EE.UU. 
					
					En cuanto a la construccion del reactor de agua ligera y a la produccion de uranio enriquecido como su combustible, la parte rusa tomo en consideracion la posicion de la parte coreana de que las actividades nucleares con fines pacificos constituyen un derecho soberano de cada pais. 
					
					Ambas partes acordaron esforzarse juntos por preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana mediante las conversaciones bilaterales y multilaterales, incluso la cita a 6 partes, y segun el espiritu de respeto a la soberania y el principio de accion simultanea, indicados en la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre.

articles.title: CRPP rechaza la calumnia del traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP rechaza la calumnia del traidor Lee Myung Bak
  Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En entrevista con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea concedida el dia 14 en relacion con la reciente injuria del gobernante surcoreano sobre la RPDC, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria respondio como sigue:
					  En su reciente gira por el sudeste asiatico, el traidor Lee Myung Bak dijo en un foro, entrevista de prensa y mesa redonda unas palabras tan malsanas como "belicosos", "cambios" y "responsabilidad" mientras censuraba atrevidamente la Direccion y el sistema de la RPDC.
					
					  Ademas, al hablar del "derecho basico" y el "derecho a la felicidad", peroro que "eso es infrenable" y "se acerca la reunificacion".
					
					  El pasado dia 3, el traidor Lee habia calumniado tambien el regimen de la RPDC hablando del "cambio" y otras cosas por el estilo durante la reunion del comite de coordinacion social adscrito al presidente titere surcoreano.
					
					  Cuando los dichos del traidor provocaron seria preocupacion en el Sur de Corea siendo calificados de "perorata imprudente", los compinches de Chongwadae (Casa Azul) los excusaron apresuradamente diciendo que no pasan de ser         "teoricos" y "palabras improvisadas" que no hubo en las informaciones preparadas previamente.
					
					  Pero, si es verdad que el traidor Lee dijo lo que no hubo en el texto original, este hecho revela mas claramente su mal genio.
					
					  Los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores y la opinion publica interna y externa estan consternados de los disparates conflictivos anti-reunificacion que pronuncia el gobernante surcoreano aqui y alla irritando a la contraparte.
					
					  Anteriormente, el traidor impropero siniestramente el regimen socialista de la RPDC cuestionando la situacion de la vida del pueblo y la economia de ella y expuso abiertamente su malsano intento planteando el llamado "impuesto de reunificacion".
					
					  Ademas, no vacilo en chismear que "se siente satisfecho de la actual politica sobre el Norte y esta dispuesto a la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas durante su mandato".
					
					  Todos los hechos muestran claramente que el traidor Lee Myung Bak es el autor que llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica de hoy.
					
					  Los dichos antinacionales de el, que corroboran sus pretensiones de confrontacion fratricida, significan imperdonable provocacion politica a la RPDC y ponen muy indignados al pueblo de esta y toda la nacion coreana.
					
					  Antes de criticar el regimen de alguien, Lee Myung Bak debe ocuparse primero de los asuntos de su casa condenada al arruinamiento.
					
					  Ahora, el Sur de Corea se ha convertido en un lugar funebre debido a la tirania fascista proyanqui y al belicismo de la banda de traidores.
					
					  Se aumentan las quejas de los habitantes y la "Asamblea Nacional" se hizo el escenario donde los politiqueros se pelean usando la violencia.
					
					  La actual banda de conservadores surcoreanos no piensa en otra cosa sino pelear dentro y fuera de casa.
					
					  Al acusar a la invencible RPDC, que avanza a pasos cada dia mas firmes, y al pueblo coreano unido monoliticamente, el traidor Lee demostro su ignorancia y estupidez.
					
					  El pueblo coreano no perdonara ni en lo minimo a cualquier tipejo que calumnie la sagrada dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					  Si el traidor Lee Myung Bak no desea que las relaciones intercoreanas entren en la coyuntura mas desastrosa que ahora, debera tener cuidado con su lengua dejando de decir improperios que traen solo las desgracias.

articles.title: ATCC comenta conducta detestable de Hyon In Thaek
articles.content:
ATCC comenta conducta detestable de Hyon In Thaek
						
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El ministro titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea, Hyon In Thaek, expone cada dia mas su naturaleza de maniaco de confrontacion y de opositor a la reunificacion. 
					En el reciente "seminario academico", el dijo que el incidente de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong fue la "peor opcion" de alguien y que "hay que disenar con iniciativa el futuro de la Peninsula Coreana tomando por norma de valoracion la libertad, los derechos humanos, la democracia y la economia del mercado". 
					
					Esta chismografia fomenta mas la confrontacion Norte-Sur en vias de agravacion y pretende politizar abiertamente la ambicion de lograr la "reunificacion a modo de absorcion". 
					
					Hyon In Thaek, autor intelectual y ejecutor material de la politica conflictiva anti-reunificacion del actual poder conservador surcoreano, agrava cada momento el enfrentamiento fratricida como jefe del Ministerio de Reunificacion.
					
					Lo que hizo el como ministro de Reunificacion fue negar totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, inventar la doctrina de "la desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3 000 dolares" conocida como manifiesto de enfrentamiento con la RPDC, llevar a la ruptura total el dialogo, la cooperacion y el intercambio entre ambas partes coreanas y agravar la desconfianza y confrontacion bajo el pretexto de "corregir las incorrectas relaciones intercoreanas" de los 10 anos pasados. 
					
					No es casual que los habitantes surcoreanos se burlaran del Ministerio de Reunificacion, que tomo la delantera en romper las relaciones intercoreanas, llamandolo como ministerio de division y confrontacion. 
					
					Ahora, los conservadores surcoreanos se encuentran en aprieto dentro y fuera del pais siendo criticados fuertemente por los nacionales y extranjeros por haber llevado a la fase catastrofica las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Para buscar la salida, chismearon hace poco que lo mas importante de la etapa actual es "debatir publicamente" los "gastos de reunificacion" y el "proyecto de suministro de recursos financieros" y lograr el "acuerdo social". Luego, presentaron el "plan decenal frente a la reunificacion" y volvieron a abogar por la reunificacion mediante la absorcion en el reciente "seminario academico".
					
					Todos los hechos muestran claramente que el verdadero objetivo de la campana conflictiva y belica contra la RPDC es oponer los regimenes de ambas partes coreanas y lograr finalmente la reunificacion mediante la absorcion. 
					
					Esta ambicion de los maniacos de confrontacion, que no saben nada del sistema social de la RPDC centrado en las masas populares, es una tonteria igual a desafiar al cielo. 
					
					Mientras existen los connotados opositores a la reunificacion como Hyon, la nacion coreana no podra evitar los desastres.

articles.title: ATCC comenta intento de enviar "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a Corea
articles.content:
ATCC comenta intento de enviar "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a Corea
 Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El premier japones, Naoto Kan, abogo por el "envio" de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana y por la elaboracion de "reglas" correspondientes bajo el rotulo de "proteger a los japoneses".
					  Esto significa la expresion mas coherente y abierta del intento de las actuales autoridades japonesas de volver a agredir a Corea.
					
					  La "proteccion de los japoneses" aludida por el premier japones es la nueva version de la doctrina de "proteccion de los japoneses residentes en otros paises", pretexto utilizado por el imperialismo japones antes de desatar las guerras de agresion en los siglos anteriores.
					
					  En 1894 cuando estallo en Corea la Guerra Campesina de Kab-o, el imperialismo japones envio a 10 mil uniformados de fuerzas terrestres y navales bajo el pretexto de "proteger" a los japoneses residentes en Corea y provoco la guerra Qing-Japon.
					
					  A principios del siglo 20, bajo el mismo pretexto, despacho muchas tropas agresoras a Corea que la ocuparon militarmente y practicaron la dominacion colonial.
					
					  La gran operacion punitiva de Jiandao, la de Manchuria Este y otras masacres registradas en la historia como banos de sangre habian sido ejecutadas bajo el pretexto de "proteger a los japoneses" y "liquidar" a las fuerzas antijaponesas.
					
					  Debido a tal politica de Japon, Corea resulto avasallada y mas de 8 millones 400 mil coreanos se trasladaron en contra de su voluntad a las tierras foraneas donde realizaron los trabajos de esclavitud. Ademas, mas de un millon de coreanos perdieron su vida.
					
					  Los hechos historicos muestran que la doctrina de "proteccion de los japoneses residentes en otros paises" fue pronombre y preludio de la agresion, la guerra y el saqueo.
					
					  Japon intenta enviar a sus "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" bajo tal pretexto en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana, partiendo de su ambicion de reagredir a Corea y realizar su viejo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" que no pudo cumplir en el siglo pasado.
					
					  Este pais isleno emplazo ya el grueso de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en la region occidental cercana a la Peninsula Coreana y reformo la "ley de la situacion de las areas del contorno", "ley en el tiempo de emergencia" y otras leyes de guerra.
					
					  En el verano de este ano, mando a sus oficiales de las "Fuerzas Navales de Autodefensa" subir en el portaaviones nuclear norteamericano "George Washington" que participo en el ejercicio maritimo conjunto entre EE.UU. y Sur de Corea efectuado en el Mar Este de Corea.
					
					  Realmente, Japon emergio como Estado belicista que ha ultimado todos los preparativos legales y materiales, inclusive los recursos humanos, para cumplir la guerra de agresion.
					
					  Lo ultimo que le falta es buscar el pretexto.
					
					 Para este fin, volvio a presentar la doctrina de "proteccion de los japoneses residentes en otros paises".
					
					  Lo insoslayable esta en que las actuales autoridades japonesas actuan astutamente para legalizar el cumplimiento de su politica de agresion a Corea justamente cuando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se halla en visperas de la guerra debido al incidente de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					  Es un vicio cronico de Japon sacar los provechos de los conflictos ajenos al fomentarlos y usarlos a su conveniencia.
					
					  Ese pais lo hizo cada vez que se tornaba tensa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, inclusive la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					  Despues del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", saco grandes provechos adulando a su amo norteamericano y aplacando el descontento y la colera de los habitantes japoneses en torno al tema de la base norteamericana en Futenma y consolido el terreno militar para la reagresion a Corea.
					
					  Ahora pretende provocar la guerra de agresion enviando abiertamente sus fuerzas armadas a la Peninsula Coreana con motivo de tal conflicto armado en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					  Toda la nacion coreana vigila agudamente la ambicion de los imperialistas japoneses de reagredir a Corea.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC no perdonaran jamas el proceder de Japon que acecha la oportunidad de reagredir, en lugar de pedir disculpas por sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado contra el pueblo coreano.
